name: ObstetricsGynecologyCards
0:
”Alexa, open obstetrics gynecology cards”
”Alexa, start obstetrics gynecology cards”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: obstetrics gynecology cards
des:
Alexa can help you learn new topics or study for your OB-GYN NBME Shelf test. You can review the flash cards and then test your knowledge. At any point you can say "Alexa, review mode" to switch to review or say "Alexa, test mode" to start a test. You can say "Alexa, next" to move to the next card. At any point during the test, you can say "Alexa, what's my score" to get your current test score.
This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
Introducing an innovative and comprehensive study tool for medical students preparing for the NBME OB/GYN exam - our Alexa flashcards. Our flashcards are designed to help you master essential concepts, medical terminology, and complex case studies with ease and efficiency. Whether you're on-the-go or at home, this skill offers a seamless learning experience that fits your busy schedule. Say goodbye to traditional study methods and embrace a smarter, more effective way to prepare for your exams. Try our Alexa flashcards now and excel in your medical career.

This skill is in no way endorsed or affiliated with NBME. 

The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only. It is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
